name: Geoff Lee Mortgage Group
overview:
The Geoff Lee Mortgage Group offers a vast divergence of mortgage and finance servicing to meet your needs. With the irregular exception, our mortgage brokering services are free of charge. Working together with us is a straightforward, carefree process.

It would be an honor to talk with you and give you some useful ideas that will help you in the coming months or years with your home and personal financial situation.

I’m sure you’ve noticed that “service” in BC just isn’t what it used to be, or ought to be anywhere. However we pride our self in doing the best job humanly possible and giving you the quality of service you rarely see anymore.

If we work together, we’ll give you the best ideas on how to improve what you are already doing. Along with some great tips on how to get the maximum value from every real estate opportunity you have.

A few of our services are: First Mortgage, Cash Back Mortgage, 100% Financing, Zero Down Mortgages, Variable Rate Mortgages, Refinancing Mortgages, Renewal Mortgages, Second Mortgages, and much more.
